title: Ping Spikes and Disconnecting
body:
Hi, I am having a severe problem with my internet connection ONLY when I am playing LoL or CSGO, being that every once in a while, my ping spikes from 35 to 2k+, disconnecting me from the game for a few seconds. 

I have tried forwarding the ports for league, clearing my caches, repairing league, updating my wifi drivers, scanning for malware, and most of the other solutions that most people suggest. 

Which Log file should I upload for you to help me the best?

replies.body:
I have the same issues you describe when trying to play with 5g wifi, when I switch to 2.4g it is solid.  Changed a ton of settings on router and computer but never could get the 5g band stable enough to play although it works fine for anything else, internet, downloading, network...etc.

Give 2.4 a shot if you haven't already

Your latency spikes and disconnections can be caused by a wide range of factors. Since you've already tried a number of steps, I recommend you use our [Connection troubleshooting log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in order to get personalized suggestions based on your network logs for the games you had issues in.

Let me know if you have questions.
